title.rendered: Quick Reminders When Going into an Interview

content.rendered:
This quick video is a great reminder of things to consider when going into an interview. Everything from body language, appearance, and putting on your listening ears.

<iframe loading="lazy" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/U43G0lLKbfo" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>

excerpt.rendered: This quick video is a great reminder of things to consider when going into an interview. Everything from body language, appearance, and putting on your listening ears.
